name: Portarius
description:
Portarius is a 2D adventure-puzzle, where you control a small spaceship equipped with a teleport gun. Solve physics puzzles, maneuver through portals and respond quickly to the deadly obstacles on your way.

Leave your compass at home, because here down under, only intuition will help you!Key features:
  • Plenty of puzzles
    Every world is unique, so are the challenges
  • Portals
    Use portals to move around
  • Pleasant design
    Aesthetic design and organic soundtrack complement the gameplay
  • Steam Cloud support.
    Compete with the friends and save your progress in cloud
  • Realistic physics
    Everything in this world is based on realistic physics.
